# Drawing Primitives Reference for Vista Graphics basic drawing primitives. ## Line `draw canvas [ line 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Box (Rectangle) `draw canvas [ box 10 10 100 100 ]` ## Circle `draw canvas [ circle 100 100 50 ]` ## Ellipse `draw canvas [ ellipse 100 100 50 30 ]` ## Arc `draw canvas [ arc 100 100 50 0 90 ]` ## Point `draw canvas [ point 100 100 ]` ## See Also - [Polygons](/wiki/graphics/drawing/polygons/) - Polygon drawing - [Drawing Primitives Tutorial](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/drawing-primitives/) - Learning guide
